verses.roman:
nityānanda, jagadānanda, dāmodara, mukunda
pāche āsi' mili' sabe pāila ānanda

synonyms: nityānanda—of the name Nityānanda; jagadānanda—of the name Jagadānanda; dāmodara—of the name Dāmodara; mukunda—of the name Mukunda; pāche āsi'-coming; mili'-meeting; sabe—all; pāila—got; ānanda—pleasure
translation: The Lord had left Nityānanda's company and had gone alone to the Jagannātha temple, but later Nityānanda, Jagadānanda, Dāmodara and Mukunda came to see Him, and after seeing Him they were very pleased.
